paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype .
Male ( MNNC ). Type-locality: Chile , Illapel.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution. Chile :
Región de Coquimbo
(Choapa, Elqui); Región de Valparaíso (Marga Marga, Petorca,

Dyspangonia Lutz, 1905: 22 , 27 (no. 11). Type-species:
Pangonia fuscipennis Wiedemann, 1828
(subs. des., Bequaert, 1924: 28 ). Fairchild, 1951: 122 (generic names of Lutz); Fairchild, 1961: 239 (Lutz Collection).
